title: Grab a pair of AirPods for nearly half off in this insane pre-Black Friday sale
content:
Macworld

If you’re looking for a cheap pair of AirPods, you can usually find the 2nd-gen model on sale for $100, a decent price for an old pair of earbuds. But we’ve never seen them as low as this: Walmart has slashed the price on the 2nd-gen AirPods to $69, a savings of $60 and a ridiculously good deal. (Note: You need to be a Walmart+ member to get this deal until 3pm ET.)

Apple updated its AirPods in 2021 with a 3rd-generation model, but the 2 nd-gen AirPods are still excellent earbuds. They come with a wired case and have Siri on board, tap controls, and 24-hour battery life when used with the wired charging case. The 3rd-gen model has a new design with shorter stems, better battery life, and spatial audio support, but costs $179—for that much more, we think the 2nd-gen model is perfectly fine

The Black Friday season is just getting started, but we doubt we’ll see a price any better than this. So if you want a pair, go grab one right now.
